title: rAmanAtham bhajEham
sahitya:
rAmanAtham bhajEham rAmacandra pUjitam


anupallavi

 kAmita phalaprada dEvam kOTi tIrttha prabhAvam 
kumAra guruguha viditam kapi brndAdi sannutam


caraNam   sEtu madhya gandhamAdana parvata vihAram sadA parvata varddhinI manOllAsakaram 
hastAmalaka natavaram hATakamaya hAradharam hatyAdi pApaharam hamsasOhAkAram
